alert.note: Alert for Panola; Quitman; Tallahatchie; Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 9:48AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Yalobusha, Tallahatchie, southeastern Quitman and southeastern Panola Counties through 1015 AM CST... At 948 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Webb, or 12 miles east of Parchman, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Batesville, Water Valley, Charleston, George Payne State Park, Coffeeville, Crowder, Webb, Sumner, Pope, Enid, Paynes, Velma, Scobey, Oakland, Courtland, Glendora, Distall, Swan Lake, Tyson and Gums. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
